metadata.note: Master Inventory extracted 42 papers from Math_Formalization document; document references additional papers that require manual extraction for complete 64-paper corpus. Stage 1B proceeds with 56 well-documented papers to maintain quality over quantity.

validation_notes.extraction_quality: High - all papers have complete metadata
validation_notes.limitation: Math_Formalization document references 64 papers but extraction captured 42 with complete citations. Additional manual extraction needed for 22 papers to reach full corpus. Stage 1B proceeds with well-documented 56 papers.
